website_summaries.verdict: If you need a beekeeping kit that includes a beekeeper suit and key tools, this is the one to get. The inexpensive price is great for beekeepers who are watching their budgets.
pros: Inexpensive, but packed with beekeeping must-have items including a suit with jacket, veil, and gloves, entrance feeder, hive brush, queen bee catcher, uncapping fork, and J hook
Makes a nice starter kit or addition to a seasoned beekeeper's collection
cons: No hive is included with this kit, but this won't concern beekeepers who need tools for hives that are already buzzing
Suit material is on the thin side

customer_reviews.title: A little small but the extras are worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I had a bee hive on my property, so I decided to take on beekeeping. It provided everything I needed to feel safe against bees. It does feel cheap, so I don't expect this item to last long, I'm okay with using it until upgrading to just a veil as it is a bit of a hassle to put on and remove. I ended up using all of the accessories included. Especially the mini feeders which was the item I didn't think I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic price for the set
customer_reviews.text: A pair of gloves alone will cost you nearly the price of this set...great value! I like it just as much as more expensive suits I've bought...the rest is an awesome bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Whole in my suit
customer_reviews.text: There was a hole in this very thin suit. I'm not afraid of bees, but getting stung irritated me because the bee dies. I'm very disappointed in the jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Brandee E. Lacava

customer_reviews.title: Jacket is small.
customer_reviews.text: Jacket did not fit way to small all the tools seem well made the feeders worked well. I'm new to keeping bees so haven't used all tools yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like a men's S/M good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Small my husband couldn't fit the top but he used the mask. He wears an xl/xxl. Great value for all the tools that came with it.
customer_reviews.author: Hhdz

customer_reviews.title: Good first time beekeeper value
customer_reviews.text: So far so good we installed bees this Sunday and used these. No stings very little sweating.
customer_reviews.author: meagan ormand

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Although it is lightweight it is still hot. Fit wouldn't go to an xl, very tight on my husband. Overall though great value
customer_reviews.author: Jgiacome

customer_reviews.title: great set for the money
customer_reviews.text: wore it and had no stings so cant get much better and its light weight wich is great for texas
customer_reviews.author: LiliVale

customer_reviews.title: Cheap products
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap material the zipper come.a.part after 4th time of usage I only used it for time now it's in the dumpster
customer_reviews.author: kamel

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great bang for your buck. The quality exceeded my expectations. The top is a little tight and short on me. I wear an XL. I could make it work, but it would be a little uncomfortable. Other then that no complaints
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely excited about this purchase when it arrived due to the fact that they gave me an extra queen bee cage clip and an extra feeder cap. I will say the material seems a little thin but it works with a long sleeve shirt underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Bee suit
customer_reviews.text: Runs small doesn't fit tall people very well . Material is thin and cheap
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Wow. What junk
customer_reviews.text: Tools were as ok quality. The suit on the other hand is very thin material. And is so tiny that it's almost skin tight on my and im.not a big dude. Tore in the armpits and the zipper broke the 2nd time wearing the suit
customer_reviews.author: adam daub

customer_reviews.title: Great suit, pleased with ma bees
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, remember order biger size than you are by one or two sizes
customer_reviews.author: Mike BarberMacy

customer_reviews.title: Thin but serves the purpose, just wear long sleeve shirt under
customer_reviews.text: Light weight is good for summer weather. But wear something underneath if you are concerned about stings
customer_reviews.author: Naturalistic Path Products LLC

customer_reviews.title: WANT PREVENT GETTING STUNG!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: WAY TO SMALL. HUSBAND IS 6'1"" CANNOT MOVE ARMS, TOO TIGHT. VERY THIN MATERIAL..
customer_reviews.author: Linda J McLendon

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Everything was excellent except the queen clips are Sub-par though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Won't be much protection except for your face
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is super thing which helps for heat but it won't help for being stung through. The hood section is a nice distance from your face yet I would suggest a hat under for extra protection for the top of your head. The tools are decent, the gloves wore through the first time they were used to move boxes for 1 hive. This gives a little piece of mind but is no where near sting proof!
customer_reviews.author: Jgirl

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality :(
customer_reviews.text: I did not like this product because it was very poor quality. Polyester thin material.I already had a suit made of sturdy cotton like denim and need another one but vendor out of stock so I tried this brand and had to return. This product will protect you but I do not like polyester suits. Prefer cotton.
customer_reviews.author: B. Kim

product_meta.title: New Beekeeping Beekeeper Suit Bee Jacket&Gloves& Bee Hive Brush & J Hook Hive Tool Set 8 Kits
feature_bullets: Size：fit for most adults. Suit shoulder width：approx.66cm / 26" Sleeve length：approx.60cm / 23.6" Full Chest: approx.130cm/51.2".
Quantity:1 x Beekeeping Jacket Veil with 1 pair of gloves,1 pc Bee Hive Brush& J Hook Hive Tool,2 pc Queen Bee Catcher,1 pc-UNCAPPING FORK TOOL,3 pcs-Mini Beekeeping Entrance Feeder.
